subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In a grouping of the top three players in the world, only Tiger Woods posted a luminous score in the first round of the World Golf Championship event. Rory McIlroy and Luke Donald struggled.
snippet: In a grouping of the top three players in the world, only Tiger Woods posted a luminous score in the first round of the World Golf Championship event. Rory McIlroy and Luke Donald struggled.
